index.discount_note: Take advantage of the low prices at the launch of the app and opt for annual payment. We guarantee the same prices for 12 months.

questions.a: Yes, you can cancel your monthly subscription and choose a higher or lower subscription anytime. Even annual subscriptions can be canceled under certain conditions.

questions.q: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal.

questions.q: Do you offer a free trial period?
questions.a: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial period for new users to explore our services.

questions.q: Will I be charged when I add my card?
questions.a: No, you will not be charged when you add your card. Charges will only be applied when you make a purchase.

questions.q: Which subscription is right for me?
questions.a: The right subscription depends on your needs. Our Smart plan is great for basic use, Genius plan offers more features, and Premium plan provides unlimited access.
